about.title: About AtipicALI
about.subtitle: Building an inclusive community for neurodivergent individuals
about.missionDescription: AtipicALI is dedicated to creating a trusted directory of neurodivergent-friendly places and services. We empower the neurodivergent community by connecting them with inclusive businesses, healthcare providers, and spaces that understand and support their unique needs.
about.visionDescription: We envision a world where neurodivergent individuals can easily find and access safe, welcoming, and accommodating spaces. We believe that diversity in thinking and perception strengthens communities and drives innovation.

value1.title: Accessibility First
value1.description: We prioritize accessibility in everything we do, ensuring our platform and resources are available to everyone.

value2.title: Community-Driven
value2.description: We believe in the power of community feedback and collaboration to build better solutions for neurodivergent individuals.

value3.title: Authentic & Inclusive
value3.description: We celebrate neurodiversity as a natural and valuable part of human variation, promoting genuine inclusion.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.formMessagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your inquiry...
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: AtipicALI ("we", "us", or "our") operates the AtipicALI website and application. This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data.

section2.title: 2. Information Collection and Use
section2.intro: We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you:
section2.item1: Personal Data: While using our Service, we may ask you to provide certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Data"). This may include, but is not limited to: Email address, First name and last name, Phone number, Cookies and Usage Data
section2.item2: Usage Data: We may also collect information on how the Service is accessed and used ("Usage Data"). This may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol address, browser type, browser version, pages you visit, time and date of your visit, and other diagnostic data.
section2.item3: Tracking Cookies: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our Service and hold certain information.
section2.item4: Third-party Services: Some Service providers we use will have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.

section3.title: 3. Use of Data
section3.content: AtipicALI uses the collected data for various purposes: To provide and maintain our Service, to notify you about changes to our Service, to allow you to participate in interactive features of our Service, to provide customer support, to gather analysis or valuable information so that we can improve our Service, to monitor the usage of our Service, to detect, prevent and address technical issues.

section4.title: 4. Security of Data
section4.content: The security of your data is important to us but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

section5.title: 5. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section5.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date at the top of this Privacy Policy.

section6.title: 6. Contact Us
section6.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us by email at the address provided below.

section7.title: 7. Your Rights
section7.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time by logging into your account or by contacting us. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

contact.title: Contact Us About Privacy
contact.description: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please don't hesitate to reach out:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms of service carefully before using AtipicALI

section1.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using the AtipicALI website and application, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

section2.title: 2. Use License
section2.intro: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on AtipicALI for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
section2.item2: Use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
section2.item3: Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on the site
section2.item4: Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials
section2.item5: Transmit the materials to anyone or "mirror" the materials on any other server

section3.title: 3. Disclaimer
section3.content: The materials on AtipicALI are provided on an 'as is' basis. AtipicALI makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

section4.title: 4. Limitations
section4.intro: In no event shall AtipicALI or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on AtipicALI, even if we or an authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.
section4.item1: The accuracy or completeness of any information on the Service
section4.item2: Any interruptions or errors in the Service
section4.item3: Any viruses or harmful code transmitted through the Service

section5.title: 5. Accuracy of Materials
section5.content: The materials appearing on AtipicALI could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. AtipicALI does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete, or current. AtipicALI may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice.

section6.title: 6. Links
section6.content: AtipicALI has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by AtipicALI of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.

section7.title: 7. Modifications
section7.content: AtipicALI may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.

contact.title: Contact Us About Terms
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

cookies.title: üç™ Hey! Let's talk about cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to make your experience better and understand how people use our site. Your choice, your privacy!
cookies.necessaryDescription: These keep the site working - things like security, login, and basic functions. We can't turn these off, but they don't track you!
cookies.analyticsDescription: These help us see which pages people visit and how long they stay. It's all anonymous - we just want to make the site better for you!

settings.title: Cookie Settings
settings.description: You can manage your cookie preferences here. Your choices will be saved and applied immediately.
settings.refreshNote: üí° Changes to analytics cookies will require a page refresh to take effect.
settings.confirmDisable: Are you sure you want to disable analytics cookies? This will reload the page.
settings.confirmEnable: Enable analytics cookies? This will reload the page to initialize tracking.
